Sift Science, San Francisco, is Hiring Machine Learning Engineers

Full-time, Onsite. Sift Science uses real-time machine learning to fight online fraud. It's a problem that cost U.S. merchants > $12B last year with 70% being a result of organized crime. We are currently seeking ML engineers to join our team to work on our diverse and exponentially growing dataset to employ large-scale, online machine learning and model millions of unique features. Sift is a tight-knit team that likes board games, yummy food, and solving challenging technical problems. Check out https://siftscience.com/jobs or ping us at recruiting@siftscience.com for more information :)
